author: GameSpot
description:
Jeff Grubb is joined by Lexi Luddy to chat about the shakeups going on at PlayStation with the company's leadership, Baldur's Gate III getting locoal co-op for Xbox Series S soon, Bloodline Rules and Intergender Wrestling heading to WWE 2K25, and many more stories for your Wednesday!

#gmm #gamemessmornings #giantbomb #videogamenews
title: PlayStation Leadership Shake-Up Sees New Sole CEO In Charge | Game Mess Mornings 01/29/25
